signatures.title: Mango
signatures.description: Mango Bingsu with sweet mango chunks, creamy condensed milk and a scoop of ice cream.

signatures.title: Strawberry
signatures.description: Strawberry Bingsu with fresh, juicy strawberries, sweet strawberry syrup, and a drizzle of condensed milk.

signatures.title: Matcha
signatures.description: Matcha Bingsu with rich, earthy matcha flavor. Topped with sweet red bean, chewy mochi, matcha ice cream and a drizzle of condensed milk.

bingsu.title: Blueberry
bingsu.description: Blueberry Bingsu with sweet blueberry chunks, creamy condensed milk and a scoop of vanilla ice cream.

bingsu.title: Chocolate
bingsu.description: Rich chocolate Bingsu topped with chocolate chips, brownie pieces, and drizzled with chocolate syrup.

bingsu.title: Oreo
bingsu.description: Cookies and cream Bingsu with crushed Oreo cookies, chocolate sauce, and a scoop of vanilla ice cream.

bingsu.title: Red Bean
bingsu.description: Traditional Korean Bingsu with sweet red beans, chewy rice cakes, and a drizzle of condensed milk.

bingsu.title: Green Tea
bingsu.description: Refreshing green tea Bingsu with red bean paste, mochi, and a sprinkle of green tea powder.

bingsu.title: Taro
bingsu.description: Unique taro-flavored Bingsu with taro chunks, sweet taro paste, and mini mochi toppings.

bingsu.title: Coffee
bingsu.description: Rich coffee-flavored Bingsu topped with chocolate-covered espresso beans and coffee jelly.

bingsu.title: Injeolmi
bingsu.description: Traditional Korean Bingsu with injeolmi (sweet rice cake) coated in roasted soybean powder.

bingsu.title: Mango Cheese
bingsu.description: Mango Bingsu with cream cheese cubes, fresh mango chunks, and cheesecake pieces.

bingsu.title: Black Sesame
bingsu.description: Rich and nutty black sesame Bingsu topped with roasted black sesame seeds, sweet red bean paste, and chewy mochi pieces.

bingsu.title: Persimmon
bingsu.description: Seasonal Korean persimmon Bingsu with sweet dried persimmon slices, honey drizzle, and a sprinkle of cinnamon.

bingsu.title: Yuzu
bingsu.description: Refreshing citrus Bingsu with yuzu (Korean citrus) zest, yuzu jelly, and a tangy yuzu syrup drizzle.

bingsu.title: Misugaru
bingsu.description: Nutritious Bingsu made with misugaru (Korean mixed grain powder), topped with nuts and a drizzle of honey.

bingsu.title: Omija
bingsu.description: Unique five-flavor berry Bingsu made with omija (magnolia berry) syrup, known for its complex sweet, sour, salty, bitter, and pungent taste.

bingsu.title: Hallabong
bingsu.description: Jeju Island specialty Bingsu featuring hallabong (Jeju tangerine) segments, zest, and a tangy hallabong syrup.

bingsu.title: Sikhye
bingsu.description: Traditional Korean sweet rice punch Bingsu with chewy rice grains, pine nuts, and a sweet malt flavor.

bingsu.title: Honey Ginger
bingsu.description: Warming honey and ginger Bingsu with candied ginger pieces, honey drizzle, and a sprinkle of cinnamon.

bingsu.title: Jujube
bingsu.description: Traditional Korean jujube (date) Bingsu with dried jujube pieces, jujube syrup, and pine nuts for a naturally sweet treat.

desserts.title: Hotteok
desserts.description: Traditional Korean sweet pancakes filled with brown sugar, cinnamon, and nuts. Served hot with a crispy exterior and gooey sweet filling.

desserts.title: Bungeoppang
desserts.description: Fish-shaped pastry filled with sweet red bean paste. Crispy on the outside and soft on the inside, this iconic Korean street food is a winter favorite.

desserts.title: Yakgwa
desserts.description: Traditional Korean honey cookie made from wheat flour, sesame oil, and honey. These flower-shaped treats have a rich history dating back to the Joseon Dynasty.

desserts.title: Songpyeon
desserts.description: Half-moon shaped rice cakes traditionally eaten during Chuseok (Korean Thanksgiving). Filled with sweet sesame seeds, red beans, or chestnuts and steamed over pine needles.

desserts.title: Gyeongdan
desserts.description: Colorful, chewy rice cake balls coated with various toppings like sesame seeds, bean powder, or coconut flakes. These bite-sized treats are perfect for special occasions.

desserts.title: Hwajeon
desserts.description: Elegant flower rice cakes made with edible flower petals pressed into rice flour dough and pan-fried. These seasonal treats are traditionally enjoyed in spring.

desserts.title: Dasik
desserts.description: Traditional pressed cookies made from various powdered ingredients like sesame, pine nuts, or soybean. These delicate, patterned treats are often served with tea.

desserts.title: Yugwa
desserts.description: Crispy, deep-fried rice snacks glazed with honey syrup. These light and airy treats have a satisfying crunch and subtle sweetness.

desserts.title: Chapssaltteok
desserts.description: Chewy glutinous rice cake filled with sweet red bean paste. This simple yet satisfying dessert is a beloved Korean comfort food.

desserts.title: Yaksik
desserts.description: Sweet glutinous rice mixed with jujubes, chestnuts, pine nuts, and honey. This nutritious dessert is traditionally served during special celebrations.

drinks.title: Choco Milk
drinks.description: Delicious chocolate milk with a hint of vanilla. Perfect for a hot summer day.

drinks.title: Strawberry Milk
drinks.description: Refreshing strawberry milk with a hint of vanilla. A perfect choice for a hot summer day.

drinks.title: Vanilla Milk
drinks.description: Classic vanilla milk with a hint of caramel. A perfect choice for a hot summer day.

drinks.title: Sikhye
drinks.description: Traditional Korean sweet rice drink made with malt water and garnished with pine nuts. Served cold for a refreshing taste.

drinks.title: Yuzu Tea
drinks.description: Refreshing Korean citrus tea made with preserved yuzu fruit and honey. Served hot or cold for a vitamin C boost.

drinks.title: Misugaru
drinks.description: Nutritious Korean multi-grain drink made with roasted grains including barley, rice, and beans. A healthy energy boost.

drinks.title: Dalgona Coffee
drinks.description: Trendy Korean whipped coffee made by vigorously mixing instant coffee, sugar, and hot water, then served over cold milk.

drinks.title: Omija Tea
drinks.description: Traditional Korean five-flavor berry tea known for its complex taste profile - sweet, sour, salty, bitter, and pungent all in one.

frozen-yogurt.title: Strawberry Frozen Yogurt
frozen-yogurt.description: Creamy frozen yogurt with fresh strawberry puree and real strawberry chunks. A perfect balance of sweet and tangy flavors.

frozen-yogurt.title: Blueberry Cheesecake Froyo
frozen-yogurt.description: Tangy frozen yogurt with blueberry swirls and graham cracker crumbles. Tastes like cheesecake but with fewer calories.

frozen-yogurt.title: Matcha Green Tea Froyo
frozen-yogurt.description: Authentic Japanese matcha green tea frozen yogurt with a subtle earthy flavor and natural sweetness. Topped with red bean paste.

frozen-yogurt.title: Mango Passion Fruit Froyo
frozen-yogurt.description: Tropical frozen yogurt with sweet mango and tangy passion fruit. A refreshing treat that transports you to a beach paradise.

frozen-yogurt.title: Honey Lavender Froyo
frozen-yogurt.description: Delicate frozen yogurt infused with organic honey and culinary lavender. A sophisticated flavor with floral notes and natural sweetness.

frozen-yogurt.title: Cookies and Cream Froyo
frozen-yogurt.description: Classic frozen yogurt blended with crushed chocolate cookies. A perfect balance of creamy yogurt and crunchy cookie pieces.

frozen-yogurt.title: Caramel Pretzel Froyo
frozen-yogurt.description: Sweet and salty frozen yogurt with caramel swirls and pretzel pieces. A delightful combination of contrasting flavors and textures.

frozen-yogurt.title: Lemon Blueberry Froyo
frozen-yogurt.description: Refreshing lemon frozen yogurt with fresh blueberry compote. A bright, tangy treat perfect for hot summer days.

frozen-yogurt.title: Pistachio Rosewater Froyo
frozen-yogurt.description: Exotic frozen yogurt infused with delicate rosewater and topped with crushed pistachios. A Middle Eastern-inspired dessert experience.

frozen-yogurt.title: Coconut Pineapple Froyo
frozen-yogurt.description: Tropical frozen yogurt with creamy coconut and sweet pineapple chunks. A vacation in a cup that brings the taste of the islands to you.
